name: AIM European Brands Association
membership: We are members of the ESC (European Shippers Council) and founding members of the Supply Chain Initiative for fair trading practices
goal:
AIM is the European Brands Association. It represents brand manufacturers in Europe on key issues which affect their ability to design, distribute and market their brands.

AIMâ€™s membership groups some 1800 companies of all sizes through corporate members and national associations in 21 countries.

In the sole sector of daily branded consumer products such as food, drink, home and personal care consumers spent as much as 653 billion Euro in the EU in 2014.

AIM's mission is to create for brands an environment of fair and vigorous competition, fostering innovation and guaranteeing maximum value to consumers now and for generations to come.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Transport
euInitiatives:
Consumer policy
Intellectual property (trade marks, anti-counterfeiting) and innovation
Sustainability (environmental, social, economic)
Health and well-being
Single market, including digital single market
Competition policy
B2B fair trading practices
Transport policy
